—description from the publisher

Name: Chain Mail: The Sacred Mask – Adventure Kit
Description:
Whispers in the corners of taverns and great libraries alike speak of an ancient mask of great power.

Many an old master look for the artifact and evil powers would kill to control it. Wear it at your own risk, for it is dangerous.

The Sacred Mask is an Adventure Kit for Chain Mail: Adventures of Earthshine.

Goal: Return the Sacred Mask to the Master.

This expansion includes:

     Quest: The Sacred Mask
     Map: Dragon's Mouth
     Monsters: Necro Lich / Skeletons
     Treasure: Winterthorn



Released in the January 2019 Board Game of the Month Club $5+ package.
Families: Game: Chain Mail – Adventures of Earthshine

Name: Zombie Golf
Description:
Its the Apocalypse, zombies roam the earth and the golf courses.  You and 4 friends are out to answer the age old question; who is the best golfer of the apocalypse.
So grab a golf bag, get down to Demon Sands Country Club and see who can win 9 holes of golf; while not dying by zombies or rage quitting because of frustration.

Zombie Golf can be played as a 3 hole party game or 9 holes of serious screw your neighbor fun.

—description from the publisher

Name: Chain Mail: The Goblin King – Adventure Kit
Description:
The caves around you shake with the rumble of an encroaching horde.

The hundreds of goblins below ground answer to only one power. The Goblin King. And every moment you delay out of fear he grows ever stronger.

The Goblin King is an Adventure Kit for Chain Mail: Adventures of Earthshine.

Goal: Repel the Goblin Horde.

This expansion includes the following:

     Quest: The Goblin King
     Character: Celynia, Shepherd
     Map: Shifting Sands
     Monsters: Ancient Ooze / Plague Rats
     Treasure: Iron Shield



Released in the February 2019 Board Game of the Month Club $5+ package.
Families: Game: Chain Mail – Adventures of Earthshine

Name: 1822: Medium Regional Scenario
Description:
This is an reduced map used for the 1822: Railways of Great Britain game, which is part of the 18xx series based on the growth of the Railways through the age of steam. It is based on a map of containing England, parts of Wales and Scottland, less of the north and southwest compared to the full 1822 map.

Players take the part of investors in Railway companies and then operate the companies to maximise their own wealth.

Three variants of the 1822 Medium Regional Scenario are given in the rules. The Starter version is intended for those with no experience with 1822. The Standard version is intended for players that wish to experience gameplay similar to the full 1822 game, but in a shorter duration. The Advanced version is more volatile and is the same as the previously web-published variant made available upon 1822’s release.

Private companies per variant:

Starter: Use P1 - P14
Standard: Use P1, P4 - P16, P18
Advanced: Use P1 - P12

The rules are available on the publisher's site.

Name: The Fanny Pack Game
Description:
"The pack is back!"

If you were a child of the '90s, you'll love the nostalgia that The Fanny Pack Game from Buffalo Games evokes when it's part of your next game night. In this '90s-themed party game, each player channels one of eight '90s personas — from mall rat to grunge rocker — presented on the character cards. Each character card features a variety of items the player needs to collect to fill their fanny pack, like knee pads for the roller blader and a ring pop for the tween girl. Players trade cards to get the items they need, with each player aiming to be the first to fill their fanny pack. All pieces tuck nicely into the totally '90s-tastic neon fanny pack, and points are tracked using classic '90s milk caps.

—description from the publisher

Name: RIDE
Description:
Generate the track, choose your Action cards to advance, deal with the Dark Rider and the Events during the race. Will you reach the finish line… alive?

Play 4 game levels stand-alone or play them all in Campaign mode. Choose wether to compete against the other riders or to create alleances to fight the terrible Dark Rider, a crazy, armored motorcyclist that's hunting you with a rifle.
Ride is the board game inspired by the film that was produced by Lucky Red and Mercurious together with Tim Vision in association with Viris, directed by Jacopo Rondinelli, artistically supervisioned by Fabio&Fabio, written by Fabio Guaglione and Marco Sani.

In Ride, you are all expert riders doing downhill, a sport where you cycle at full speed following difficult tracks. The secret association Black Babylon has gathered you in an exclusive race but soon you all realize you are gambling your own life! To win the big money prize of this extreme reality show, you need to reach the end of the track scoring the most points and, most importantly, without dying.

—description from the publisher (translated)

Name: Super Heros
Description:
Each of the players takes a girl or boy figurine and puts it in front of him. The cards are mixed and put face down in the middle. The youngest player starts. 
In turn, the players turn over a card from the stack, place it to one side of the “kitty” and act depending on the card:
Depending on the cards and the actions, the players put on elements from the superhero’s costume or remove them.
The game ends when one of the players has completed his outfit with the three elements.

—user summary

Name: ベストワードクラブ (Best Word Club)
Profi: Das heitere Berufespiel
Description:
This game was awarded a gold medal in 1974 at the Geneva International Inventors Fair.

It is recommended for children from the age of 12 to playfully learn how important it is to have a good education and vocational training to succeed in life.

The first part of the game is therefore about school and work.
In the second part, players try to buy as many businesses and stocks as possible, hiring employees and working for profit.

In this game, you will learn, among other things, about loans and repayments, corporations, business companies, pre-emption rights, payment difficulties and bankruptcy.

All things that are unfortunately not explained in school lessons.

—user summary

Name: Legends Untold: The Alchemist Novice Booster
Description:
The Achean Alchemists, with their unparalleled knowledge of herbology, travel far and wide across Mor Nadar to gather the herbs and plants they need to brew powerful potions.  The novices amongst the Acheans are known as Gardeners as they tend the Great Gardens of Achea.

This pack give you a first glimpse of resource gathering and item creation in Legends Untold. Gather Herbs and Brew Potions on your adventures as you seek entry to the great city of Dun Mordhain.

Name: BloodRunes
Description:
BloodRunes is a game of Strategy and Chance.  Collect Runes in your hand to cast your spells and gain Blood Fortunes.  Steal from other Casters or cast Protection Wards to defend against attack.  All Players share the same board and must cast Runes that benefit themselves without helping their opponents.  Keep a close eye on other Casters' spells to determine their strategies, while bringing your own plans to fruition.  Use your Acolytes to do your bidding and win the game.  Or scheme with other Casters to target a particular enemy.

CAUTION: BloodRunes will start fights and break up marriages.  Play with caution.

BloodRunes is a 2 to 4 player game and takes about an hour to play.  Great for a mind-bending afternoon of gaming.

—description from the publisher

Name: Art-ish
Description:
You are a talented painter. At least that’s what your mom says. Your art teachers, however, say you’re good… ish. But somehow, you still manage to get portrait commissions (mostly friends and family). They don’t pay very well (just in Exposure), but it’s still nice to be appreciated. So get out there and paint!

In Art-ish you’ll be mixing colors to paint splatters on your canvas with the goal of fulfilling commissions. Be the first player to earn 8 Exposure points to win.

On their turn, players create Splatters using different combinations of Paint Tubes from their hand with the goal of reproducing the model on one of the Commission Cards.

When a player has fulfilled a Commission card by matching its Splatters in the proper location, they gain that number of Exposure and a special ability to use during their subsequent turns. Abilities and points vary depending on the difficulty of the Commission.

-description from publisher

Name: Circus Corgis
Description:
Circus Corgis is a Trick-Taking, Treat eating, Star Bidding, low rider game for all levels! 
Once cards are dealt, players bid on how many tricks they’ll win. The more specific you are with your prediction, the greater the reward. Earn Treats to incentivize your pups and play the higher value of a card. Earn 5 Trophies to win!! 
Outbid and out-trick your opponents, and put on the most spectacular show in Circus Corgis!

Players are dealt 9 cards, then bid on how many Stars (or tricks) they will win.  
In turn order, each player plays a corgi. They may play a Treat to play that card's higher value. Players must follow suit and play the same color as the starting card. When all players have played a card, the highest card wins a star. Play continues until all cards have been played. 
When the round is finished, each player assesses if they have successfully achieved their bid. If so, they take the corresponding rewards: treats and trophies. If they over bid or under bid, they do not receive any points. 
The game ends when one player earns a total of 5 points!

—description from the publisher

Name: Fallen Land: Gen Con 2019 Promo Cards
Description:
These two cards will be shuffled into the upcoming Town Events Deck that replaces the current Town Events Chart roll on the First Player Sheet.

Available at publisher's booth at Gen Con 2019

-description from publisher

Name: Red Alert: Space Fleet Warfare – Carrier Starship Escalation Pack
Description:
Escalation packs present additional starship models, rules, and terrain to add to the RED ALERT core game.

This escalation Pack contains:
1 Commonwealth Carrier
3 Commonwealth Carrier fighters
1 Confederation Carrier
3 Confederation Carrier fighters
1 rulebook with 2 scenarios
1 punchboard of counters

—description from the publisher
Families: Game: Red Alert – Space Fleet Warfare

Name: Red Alert: Space Fleet Warfare – Dreadnought Starship Escalation Pack
Description:
Escalation packs present additional starship models, rules, and terrain to add to the RED ALERT core game.

This escalation Pack contains:
1 Commonwealth Dreadnought 
3 Commonwealth Dreadnought fighters
1 Confederation Dreadnought 
3 Confederation Dreadnought fighters
1 rulebook with 2 scenarios
1 punchboard of counters

—description from the publisher
Families: Game: Red Alert – Space Fleet Warfare

Name: The Grand Museum of Art
Description:
Catastrophe! The Grand Museum of Art may have to close forever! The Museum Director just jumped ship, leaving behind an enormous hidden deficit.

It’s up to you and your fellow curators to increase visitor attendance and keep the museum running. To do this, you must present grandiose exhibitions that will attract crowds of visitors and fill the museum coffers to save the institution from financial ruin.

The curator with the most popular exhibitions will become the new Museum Director!

In the beginning every player has got a couple of art (painting) cards and also a couple of (secret) exhibition cards as goals to complete collections. Every exhibition card consist of art cards, but there are a lot of paintings that belong to more exhibitions. If a player collects every card of her/his exhibition card she/he gets more victory points than the independent cards have. 
To collect cards players have to roll dice and move pawns, they can get cards (art or exhibition) in various forms, they can steel from each other, they can answer trivia about the paintings. At the end of the game the player with the most victory point wins the game.
Families: Theme: Fine Art and Art Museums
